author: Don Beach (Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt)
description: Rhum Agricole and Allspice Dram play a huge role in what is one of the most complex of all classic Tiki drinks.
name: Three Dots and a Dash
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: FLASH-BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour into Tiki mug / pilsner glass
TOP with more crushed ice and serve with sustainable straws
